title._content: Image taken from page 47 of 'Here and There in our own Country. Embracing sketches of travel and descriptions of places, etc., etc. By popular writers (Edmund Kirke, Louise Seymour Houghton [and others]). With 127 illustrations'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Here and There in our own Country. Embracing sketches of travel and descriptions of places, etc., etc. By popular writers (Edmund Kirke, Louise Seymour Houghton [and others]). With 127 illustrations" Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10409.d.2." Page: 47 Place of Publishing: Philadelphia Date of Publishing: 1885 Publisher: J. B. Lippincott Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000799733 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
